name: Immortal Hero
description:
It is a 3D RPG game with a 3rd person view produced by a college graduation work.
Go on a journey to defeat the devil and save the world and gain wealth and honor.
You can level up by defeating monsters, or grow through specific equipment and skills.
The ultimate goal of the game is to defeat the Demon King in the Demon Castle, and before that, you must first defeat his minions.
You can also see hidden stories through interactive elements found in the middle of the game.
